entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report "preview" more classy #34526
  • Allow customization of OS X Code Sign utility #34514
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35390: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #34510
  • `dotnet tool install --local --no-cache` ignoring the `--no-cache` flag for locally built packages #34508
  • Warning caused by EnableAOTAnalyzer points to IsAotCompatible #34505
  • Dotnet: Multi-target projects require all 'TargetFrameworks' installed in order to build #34496

Closed

  • msbuild.exe is only available in visual studio right? #34020
  • How to build SDK? #14966
  • dotnet new locks after execution #14750
  • `dotnet run` help doesn't show help about `--urls` #34386
  • remove EnableWindowsTargeting #34495

PullRequests

Created

  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34529
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #34527
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #34525
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #34521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #34516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle unknown version in EnvironmentInfo test helper #34519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #34513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of newtonsoft package version #34266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • don't copy over the .dotnet dependencies if they are already there #34459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #34518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #34515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2238645 #34520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #34512
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #34511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation and test for the DisableRuntimeMarshalling attribute. #34388
    untriaged

Updated

  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Support Records in GenAPI #34433
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
